Personal speech translator in real time conversations for new scales of your income.

Pass an interview and work remotely for a company from any country. Create and scale an international business by attracting partners, investors and employees from all over the world. Find high-paying orders, conduct consultations and online lessons worldwide. Or use just for fun. And all this no longer requires knowledge of languages.

 - It does not require installation by the interlocutors or complex configuration.
 - It works almost instantly: from 1 to 3 seconds of delay.
 - Free start.

Currently, the extension has been successfully tested on Google Meet. This list will be expanded in the near future.

Please note that our extension is currently in beta testing mode. If you encounter any problems, please write to us support@linguatwin.ai
